## Description

`economiccomplexity` is a package to build  bipartite networks such as countries
and their exported products.

## Installation

```{r, eval = FALSE}
# Install stable version from CRAN
install.packages("economiccomplexity")

# Install stable version from GitHub
devtools::install_github("pachamaltese/economiccomplexity")
```
